description: This course has been designed to provide a comprehensive information on Magic Lantern, a software that can transform a Canon DSLR to a versatile film camera. Apart from providing detail information on Magic Lantern, this tutorial demonstrates some key workflows on shooting RAW, HDR and Time-lapse Video. A detail information on using external audio recording device, techniques to install custom picture style, and instruction on making custom cropmakrs have been provided. A detail instruction on how to use Look Up Table (LUT) with CineStyle Picture profile has also been given. This 3 hours long course is one of the most comprehensive tutorials on this topic.
title: Shoot Video with Magic Lantern in Canon DSLR Camera
